page.title: 01GAZATEER ASHBY MAGNA
page.content:
This block is a farming community containing two villages Ashby Magna - population 265, and Peatling Parva - Population l38
The majority of the land is used for grazing sheep, cattle and horses with fields surrounded by hedges. The disused Bruntingthorpe airfield is now used for warehousing and as a vehicle test track.
Hubbards Farm Ashby Magna which is owned and sponsored by Leicestershire County Council is run as a Government Youth Training Scheme.
There are no major roads in this this block.
